Title: Policy brief highlights vital role of cooling
Summary: BELGIUM: European HVACR industry association, Eurovent, is calling for urgent EU action to support the transition to sustainable cooling in a a future marked by rising temperatures.

Title: JC heat pumps in Zürich district heating expansion
Summary: SWITZERLAND: Ammonia heat pumps from Johnson Controls are to be employed in an expansion of a Zürich waste incineration plant supplying the city’s district heating system.

Title: Qvantum UK appoints Exi-Tite as distributor
Summary: UK: Heat pump manufacturer Qvantum UK has further expanded its UK mainland distribution network with the appointment of HVAC supplier Exi-tite as a key partner.

Title: Tesco orders five CO2/R1270 refrigerated lorries
Summary: UK: After successful trials last year, Supermarket Tesco has ordered five refrigerated vehicles fitted with refrigeration units using CO2 and R1270 (propene).

Title: Stulz side cooler for higher heat loads
Summary: GERMANY: The CyberRack SideCooler from Stulz is designed to meet the cooling demands of data centres in space constrained or remote locations.

Title: Dual electronic expansion valve controller
Summary: SPAIN: Sanhua has introduced eDual (SECD04), a superheat controller that can handle two independent expansion valves in the same circuit.

Title: UK minister to address HPA conference
Summary: UK: The Minister for Energy Consumers, Miatta Fahnbulleh, will give a keynote address at the Heat Pump Association’s (HPA) first conference in November.
